Hi!

I'm Jingxuan.

I’m a highly motivated web developer. I make responsive and accessible websites using HTML, CSS, JS, React and NextJS.

I'm interested in a wide range of web technologies such as serverless functions, WebSockets and PWA.

My Projects

I love building projects. I jump from one project to another while exploring different technologies and levelling up my practical skills.

Beside programming languages, I also like spoken languages. I put my passion for languages into code.

All my projects are designed and implemented from ground up. Some are built around languages. Take a look!

Click a feature to play

Lingpal

A real-time multiplayer game to practice languages. It’s based on the game Taboo, but more optimized for language learning. It supports simutaneous game sessions. Players can choose a level, take notes, give ratings, etc.

  • NextJS
  • Deno
  • MongoDB
  • Socket.io

GitHub

Link

Click a feature to play

Recipear

A recipe app featuring speech recognition to provide a hand-free cooking experience. It allows users to easily search and filter recipes. Authenticated users can also create, edit, like and save recipes.

  • React
  • Firebase
  • Speech Recognition

GitHub

Link

Click a feature to play

Read-y

The app aims to help users understand Mandarin texts. It provides word parsing, word look-up and the phonetics for whatever text the user inputs. There is also an option to download the output as PDF.

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JS
  • Webpack

GitHub

Link

Click a feature to play

Pet Home

The app helps users to find potential pets to adopt based on location. The data come from a public API and are thus updated in real time. Users can also filter the pets by age, breed, etc.

  • React
  • API Requests

GitHub

Link
